title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for January 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for January 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis. The episodes from January 13 to January 17, 2025 will celebrate Holland America Cruise Week, meaning that we expect some of the prize puzzles will likely be, well, cruises. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Adam Vega, Angela Johnson, and Frank Mantesana. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 16. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, January 16, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – TOUGH BUT FAIR [Phrase] Tossup #1 – THE ADVENTURE BEGINS [Phrase] Tossup #2 – VINTAGE CLOTHES [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #1 – WEDDING PLANNERS & DIVORCE LAWYERS [Occupation] Regular Puzzle #2 – OCEAN EYES BY BILLIE EILISH [Song/Artist] Regular Puzzle #3 – STICKING TO MY RESOLUTIONS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – A CASE OF THE JITTERS [Thing] Tossup #4 – A CASE OF THE GIGGLES [Thing] Tossup #5 – A CASE OF THE MONDAYS [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – WORLD ATLAS [Around The House] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 15: Bonus Round Puzzle – AS YOU WISH [Phrase] Tossup #1 – ALL HANDS ON DECK [All Aboard!] Tossup #2 – LEAVE NO STONE UNTURNED [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #1 – ROPES, RIGGING, RUDDER, RAFTS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – TASMANIA AND NEW ZEALAND [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #3 – EMBARKING ON A VOYAGE [Event] Tossup #3 – ANT COLONY [Thing] Tossup #4 – ARTIST COLONY [Thing] Tossup #5 – NUDIST COLONY [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – PILATES INSTRUCTOR [Occupation] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 17 episode. This week, Wheel Watchers Club members can enter a Holland America cruise for two. All you need to do is watch the Bonus Round puzzle (or just look above) and enter the solution on the Wheel of Fortune website. (Each day will feature a different cruise.) You can also win cash in the $50K for our 50 Giveaway contest.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis.

The episodes from January 13 to January 17, 2025 will celebrate Holland America Cruise Week, meaning that we expect some of the prize puzzles will likely be, well, cruises. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Adam Vega, Angela Johnson, and Frank Mantesana. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 16.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, January 16, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – TOUGH BUT FAIR [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – THE ADVENTURE BEGINS [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – VINTAGE CLOTHES [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – WEDDING PLANNERS & DIVORCE LAWYERS [Occupation]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – OCEAN EYES BY BILLIE EILISH [Song/Artist]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – STICKING TO MY RESOLUTIONS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – A CASE OF THE JITTERS [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – A CASE OF THE GIGGLES [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – A CASE OF THE MONDAYS [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – WORLD ATLAS [Around The House]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 15:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – AS YOU WISH [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – ALL HANDS ON DECK [All Aboard!]
  • Tossup #2 – LEAVE NO STONE UNTURNED [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – ROPES, RIGGING, RUDDER, RAFTS [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TASMANIA AND NEW ZEALAND [On The Map]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – EMBARKING ON A VOYAGE [Event]
  • Tossup #3 – ANT COLONY [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – ARTIST COLONY [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – NUDIST COLONY [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – PILATES INSTRUCTOR [Occupation]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 17 episode.

This week, Wheel Watchers Club members can enter a Holland America cruise for two. All you need to do is watch the Bonus Round puzzle (or just look above) and enter the solution on the Wheel of Fortune website. (Each day will feature a different cruise.) You can also win cash in the $50K for our 50 Giveaway contest.
